meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

docTitle.name: shortTitle
docTitle.content: Securities and Futures (Open-ended Fund Companies) (Fees) Regulation

subsection.def: Cap. 32 (第32章) means the Companies (Winding Up and Miscellaneous Provisions) Ordinance (Cap. 32);
intended OFC (籌劃中公司) has the meaning given by section 112ZJA(1) of the Ordinance; (33 of 2021 s. 28)
non-Hong Kong fund corporation (非香港基金法團) has the meaning given by section 112ZJA(1) of the Ordinance; (33 of 2021 s. 28)
Registrar (處長) means the Registrar of Companies;
Rules (《規則》) means the Securities and Futures (Open-ended Fund Companies) Rules (Cap. 571 sub. leg. AQ); (E.R. 4 of 2018)

sub-fund (子基金)—(a)in relation to a proposed company the instrument of incorporation of which provides for the division of its property into separate parts—means each of the separate parts; and(b)in relation to an open-ended fund company—has the meaning given by section 112R of the Ordinance.

subsection.leadIn: In Schedule 3, a reference to section 284 of Cap. 32—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in relation to the winding up of an open-ended fund company under Part 11 of the Rules (Part 11)—is a reference to a provision of Part 11 that is equivalent to that section, subject to the necessary modifications and modifications specified in Division 2 of Part 11 (subject provision); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in relation to the winding up of a sub-fund under Part 11—is a reference to the subject provision subject to the modifications specified in Division 3 of Part 11.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Fees for certain applications made in relation to proposed companies

subsection.content: A fee specified in column 3 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 is payable to the Commission for an application (specified application) described, opposite the fee, in column 2 of that Part.

subsection.leadIn: Subsection (1) does not apply to a specified application if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: at the time the specified application is made, an application is also made to the Commission under section 104 of the Ordinance for the proposed company concerned; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: an application has been made under that section for the proposed company concerned and is pending at the time the specified application is made. (33 of 2021 s. 29)

section.name: s3A
section.heading: Fees for certain applications made in relation to non-Hong Kong fund corporations

subsection.content: A fee specified in column 3 of Part 1A of Schedule 1 is payable to the Commission for an application (specified application) described, opposite the fee, in column 2 of that Part.

subsection.leadIn: Subsection (1) does not apply to a specified application if—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: an application has been made under that section for the non-Hong Kong fund corporation concerned and is pending at the time the specified application is made; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: an authorization is granted under that section for the non-Hong Kong fund corporation concerned.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Fees for certain applications made in relation to open-ended fund companies

subsection.content: A fee specified in column 3 of Part 2 of Schedule 1 is payable to the Commission for an application described, opposite the fee, in column 2 of that Part.
Subsection (1) does not apply to an application if at the time the application is made, the open-ended fund company concerned is authorized under section 104 of the Ordinance.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Time for payment
section.content: A fee payable under section 3 or 4 for an application is to be paid when the application is made.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Waiver of fees
section.content: If, in a particular case, the Commission is of the opinion that the payment of a fee under section 3 or 4 would be inappropriate or unduly burdensome, the Commission may waive, in whole or in part, the fee.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Fees for inspecting or obtaining documents and information
section.content: A fee specified in column 3 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 is payable to the Registrar for the matter described, opposite the fee, in column 2 of that Part.

section.name: s8
section.heading: Miscellaneous fees payable to Registrar
section.content: A fee specified in column 3 of Schedule 3 is payable to the Registrar for the matter described, opposite the fee, in column 2 of that Schedule.

td.p: An application under section 112D(1) of the Ordinance to register a proposed company which could have one or more sub-funds
An application under section 112D(1) of the Ordinance to register any other proposed company

part.name: P1A
part.heading: Fees for Non-Hong Kong Fund Corporations

td.p: An application under section 112ZJB(1) of the Ordinance to register a non-Hong Kong fund corporation where the intended OFC has or could have one or more sub-funds
An application under section 112ZJB(1) of the Ordinance to register a non-Hong Kong fund corporation in any case other than that described in item 1
An application for an approval under rule 9(2) of the Rules to change the name of an open-ended fund company
An application for an approval under rule 101(3) of the Rules to appoint a person to be a director
An application for an approval under rule 114(3) of the Rules to appoint a person to be a custodian
An application for an approval under rule 125(3) of the Rules to appoint a person to be an investment manager
An application for an approval under rule 160(1) of the Rules to establish one or more sub-funds
An application for an approval under rule 160(3) of the Rules to terminate one or more sub-funds
An application for an approval under rule 161 of the Rules to change the name of one or more sub-funds
An application under section 112ZH of the Ordinance to cancel the registration of an open-ended fund company

An application under section 112ZO of the Ordinance for the granting of a modification or waiver in relation to a person specified in section 112ZO(2) of the Ordinance in respect of a requirement of the Rules

schedule.name: sch2
schedule.heading: Fees Payable to Registrar for Inspecting or Obtaining Documents and Information

section.name: s1
section.def: OFC register (開放式基金型公司登記冊) has the meaning given by rule 2 of the Rules;
on-site user (到場使用者) means a person inspecting or obtaining, at the specified place, any document or information contained in the OFC register;
principal account (主要帳户) means the first account that a registered online user registers with the Registrar under a registration arrangement;
registered online user (登記用户) means a person who has entered into a registration arrangement with the Registrar;

registration arrangement (登記安排) means an arrangement under which a person may register one or more accounts with the Registrar through which that person may use online medium for inspecting and obtaining documents and information contained in the OFC register;
specified place (指明地點) means the office of the Registrar at which the OFC register is made available for inspection under rule 41 of the Rules;
subsequent account (其後帳户) means any account, other than the principal account, that a registered online user registers with the Registrar under a registration arrangement;
unregistered online user (無帳户使用者) means a person, other than a registered online user, using an online medium for inspecting or obtaining documents and information contained in the OFC register.

part.name: P2
part.heading: Fees for Inspecting or Obtaining Documents and Information Relating to Open-ended Fund Companies

td.p: O—Fee payable by an on-site user
R—Fee payable by a registered online user
U—Fee payable by an unregistered online user

tr.td: Under rule 41(3) of the Rules, for obtaining, by way of downloading through online medium, an image record of—
an account made up by a liquidator in respect of an open-ended fund company, or a sub-fund, being wound up under Part 11 of the Rules

td.p: Under rule 41(3) of the Rules, for obtaining, at the specified place, a copy of an image record of—

tr.td: an account made up by a liquidator in respect of an open-ended fund company, or a sub-fund, being wound up under Part 11 of the Rules

td.p: Under rule 41(2) and (3) of the Rules, for online inspection of, and obtaining, an image record of—

tr.td: an account made up by a liquidator in respect of an open-ended fund company, or a sub-fund, being wound up under Part 11 of the Rules

td.p: Under rule 41(2) of the Rules, for inspecting information contained in the index of directors kept under rule 109(1) of the Rules—

tr.td: for each inspection of the list of directors of an open-ended fund company
for each inspection of the particulars of a director of an open-ended fund company
for each inspection of all the directorships held by a person in any open-ended fund companies
Under rule 41(3) of the Rules, for obtaining a copy of a record containing the current particulars of an open-ended fund company, per company

td.p: For registering an account with the Registrar for inspecting and obtaining documents and information contained in the OFC register per year—
Lodging an incorporation form and a copy of the instrument of incorporation delivered under section 112C of the Ordinance
Incorporating an open-ended fund company under section 112C of the Ordinance (33 of 2021 s. 33)
Lodging a re-domiciliation form and a copy of the instrument of incorporation delivered under section 112ZJC of the Ordinance (33 of 2021 s. 33)
Issuing a certificate of re-domiciliation under section 112ZJC of the Ordinance (33 of 2021 s. 33)
Lodging a notice of change of company name delivered under rule 9(4) of the Rules
Issuing a certificate of change of name under rule 9(7) of the Rules
Certifying under rule 41(3) of the Rules a copy of any document or information (including an extract of a document) contained in the OFC register
Registering a notice delivered under rule 174(1) or (3) of the Rules
Inspecting under section 284 of Cap. 32 a liquidator’s statement sent to the Registrar in respect of the winding up of an open-ended fund company or a sub-fund under Part 11 of the Rules

Obtaining under section 284 of Cap. 32 a copy of a liquidator’s statement, or a part of the statement, sent to the Registrar in respect of the winding up of an open-ended fund company or a sub-fund under Part 11 of the Rules—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: if the copy is made by photographic means and its size does not exceed 210 mm x 297 mm

td.p: $13 per page (or portion of a page)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: if the copy is made by photographic means and its size exceeds 210 mm x 297 mm

td.p: $13, plus an additional fee not exceeding $5 that is specified by the Registrar, per page (or portion of a page)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: if the copy is made by any other means—
for a copy that is certified by the Registrar
